text: David Boston Barker (born 12 April 1943) is a British equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. His cousin is C. David Barker. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:British male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: David B. Barker
